name: Sushi Ink
description:
This was a Ludum Dare 47 entry for the theme stuck in a loop.

Set in a near future world, you control an octopus sushi chef. Your goal is to make as much money (and sushi) as you can to complete the levels.

Using your many tentacles, you need to use all of the tools at your disposal to ensure customer satification.

OST available here

Controls

Move the mouse to move the active tentacle.

click to pick things up and relesease to put them down. If you have no where to put it then the tentacle will keep hold of the item

A or D to cycle through the tentacles

Made by

  • Morgan Owen - Code
  • Matt Thomas - Music  
  • Ryan Assis - Art
